title: Grup Yorum
description:
Grup "Yorum" is a Turkish/Kurdish band known for their political songs. Grup Yorum (Yorum means interpretation or comment in Turkish) has released twenty albums since 1987. Many of the group members were arrested and tortured. Some of their concerts and albums were banned, but Yorum remains popular and their albums continue to sell well in Turkey and internationally. Yorum has also given concerts in Germany, Austria, Australia, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, United Kingdom, and Greece.
In 1985, 4 friends at Marmara ÃƒÆ’Ã…â€œniversitesi formed Grup Yorum. The group composition has been in a constant state of change since the group's inception, and throughout history Grup Yorum has experienced political oppression. Group members have been arrested many times, and countless trials (approximately 400) have been opened for the members. Their albums have been seized by police and their concerts banned, but despite this Grup Yorum has been one of the top selling groups in the history of Turkey. The band was inspired by Ruhi Su, Mahzuni Ãƒâ€¦Ã…Â¾erif, "Inti Illimani", Victor Jara, "Quilapayun" and Theodorakis, as well as socialist movements in Turkey and abroad.
There are all the 20 albums of "Yorum" here, and also a selection of my favorite songs of this group (the folder "Selection").
